001001 00000 00001 0011001101010101     # addi $r0 $r1 1
010000 00001 00000 00010 00000 000000   # sll $r1 $r2 0
000000 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r2
00000000000000000011001101010101

010000 00010 00000 00011 00001 000000   # sll $r2 $r3 1
000000 00011 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r3
00000000000000000110011010101010

010000 00011 00000 00100 00010 000000   # sll $r3 $r4 2
000000 00100 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r4
00000000000000011001101010101000

001001 00000 00101 0000000011111111     # addi $r0 $r5
010000 00101 00000 00110 01000 000000   # sll $r5 $r6 8
000000 00110 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r6
00000000000000001111111100000000

010000 00110 00000 00111 00100 000000   # sll $r6 $r7 4
000000 00111 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r7
00000000000011111111000000000000

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
